ip:         128.1.6.5/12

ip binario: 10000000.00000001.00000110.00000101 => 128.1.6.5

mask:       11111111.11110000.00000000.00000000 => 255.240.0.0

rete:       10000000.00000000.00000000.00000000 => 128.0.0.0

broad:      10000000.00001111.11111111.11111111 => 128.15.255.255

gate1:      10000000.00000000.00000000.00000001 => 128.0.0.1

gate2:      10000000.00001111.11111111.11111110 => 128.15.255.254

n host = 2^(32-12) - 2 = 2^20 - 2 = 1.048.576 - 2 => 1.048.574


---


ip:         200.1.2.3/24

ip binario: 11001000.00000001.00000010.00000011 => 200.1.2.3

mask:       11111111.11111111.11111111.00000000 => 255.255.255.0

rete:       11001000.00000001.00000010.00000000 => 200.1.2.0

broad:      11001000.00000001.00000010.11111111 => 200.1.2.255

gate1:      11001000.00000001.00000010.00000001 => 200.1.2.1

gate2:      11001000.00000001.00000010.11111110 => 200.1.2.254

n host = 2^(32-24) - 2 = 2^8 - 2 = 254


---


ip:         192.192.1.1/22

ip binario: 11000000.11000000.00000001.00000001 => 192.192.1.1

mask:       11111111.11111111.11111100.00000000 => 255.255.252.0

rete:       11000000.11000000.00000000.00000000 => 192.192.0.0

broad:      11000000.11000000.00000011.11111111 => 192.192.3.255

gate1:      11000000.11000000.00000000.00000001 => 192.192.0.1

gate2:      11000000.11000000.00000011.11111110 => 192.192.3.254

n host = 2^(32-22) - 2 = 2^10 - 2 = 1024 - 2 = 1022


---


ip:         126.5.4.3/9

ip binario: 01111110.00000101.00000100.00000011 => 126.5.4.3

mask:       11111111.10000000.00000000.00000000 => 255.128.0.0

rete:       01111110.00000000.00000000.00000000 => 126.0.0.0

broad:      01111110.01111111.11111111.11111111 => 126.127.255.255

gate1:      01111110.00000000.00000000.00000001 => 126.0.0.1

gate2:      01111110.01111111.11111111.11111110 => 126.127.255.254

---

ip:         172.16.0.4/16

ip binario: 10101100.00010000.00000000.00000100 => 172.16.0.4

mask:       11111111.11111111.00000000.00000000 => 255.255.0.0

rete:       10101100.00010000.00000000.00000000 => 172.16.0.0

broad:      10101100.00010000.11111111.11111111 => 172.16.255.255

gate1:      10101100.00010000.00000000.00000001 => 172.16.0.1

gate2:      10101100.00010000.11111111.11111110 => 172.16.255.254

n host = 2^(32-16) - 2 = 2^16 - 2 = 65.536 - 2 = 65.534
